name: Cocktails App
description: This was a fun project that is actually a revamped edition to an older version, which was build with just React. This iteration was built within Next13 utilizing Typescript and integrating api calls with React Query.

name: White Peak Contracting
description: This was sort of a concept Web Page that I wanted to create for my brother's contracting business. It was more of an excuse to work with Tailwind for the first time as well as continue playing with framer-motion.

name: Last Best Place Brewery
description: I built this as a concept for my buddy's brewery. I was inspired after I found some cool animations that I thought would work in showcasing his various brews in a fun way. This was also my first time working with Next and I gotta say it feels luxurious to not have to build all the routes haha.

name: Bad Canyon Designs
description: I had tried to build an eCommerce site once before and failed miserably. After a bit more grinding I felt confident to try again. My cousin's design business was a perfect opportunity to do just that. This was also my first time working with Redux and React-Bootstrap. I experienced a lot of growth in this project and am pleased that it doesn't crash on load haha.

name: Quiz App
description: This was a fun app to play with and experienced a lot of initial growing pains as a developer. Nothing to flashy, just plain ol' React, but a great rush when it finally fully worked.
